name: redux-immutable-tools
description: A collection of assorted immutable utility functions for dealing with Redux
author: Fredrik Westmark (fredrik.westmark@gmail.com)

scripts.build: npm run build:es && npm run build:commonjs
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel src --presets react-app --plugins transform-es2015-modules-commonjs --transform-es2015-modules-commonjs loose --out-dir lib --copy-files
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel src --presets react-app --out-dir es --copy-files
scripts.watch:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel src --presets react-app --out-dir es --copy-files --watch
